subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Albany Great Danes gave Connecticut a bit of a scare in last season’s N.C.A.A. tournament.  The college basketball minnow will get another shot at the Huskies this season.
snippet: The Albany Great Danes gave Connecticut a bit of a scare in last season’s N.C.A.A. tournament.  The college basketball minnow will get another shot at the Huskies this season.
